title: Drawing, "Woodland Scene in Autumn (Hudson, New York or Maine)", 1860–70
medium: Brush and oil paint on paperboard
markings: Cooper Union stamp to be checked for location
description: Behind low hill slopping from lower right to upper left, trees in autumn foliage (one on right bright orange) on left and right.  Through trees a turquoise lake with low mountain peak rising in center distance.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Woodland Scene in Autumn (Hudson, New York or Maine)", 1860–70.
1860–70. Brush and oil paint on paperboard. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-1371.
